item.description:
Please buy your tickets at the following address:

https://www.eventbrite.com/event/4113266892

 

The 35th Brewfest at the Beach will be held Friday, May 10, from 6 to 9 p.m. Choose to taste from more than 150 beers from all over the world representing virtually every style of beer made.  Local beers, seasonals and new brews to the area will be featured in addition to all your favorites and more.  Live musical entertainment by the Rhythm Method band for your dancing and listening enjoyment. Brew friendly food also included at no extra charge.  Cigars and beer memorabilia available for purchase. Brewery reps on hand to answer your questions.   Advance sale tickets are $25 each and include 15 beer tasting tickets, free brew friendly food and the ambiance of Ocean Beach Park.  Tickets day of event are $30.00.
item.how_to_find_us: We will plan a spot to meet up together at the event once we see how many people are going.

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Brewfest at the Beach
